'''Lingering Moment'''  is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Lingering Moment is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=240}}.

Interacting with the Lingering Moment lets the player choose an unlocked [[Hangout Event/Gallery|Hangout Memory]] to display. Guests via the [[Co-Op Mode]] can also interact with it to view the displayed image.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 16h
|Cuihua Wood = 12
|Fabric = 6
|sort = Cuihua Wood;Fabric
}}
